channel.title: Ambambo Kili – Malayalam Kids Videos
channel.description: Latest Malayalam kids songs, stories, and Kerala cartoons from Ambambo Kili.

item.title: Dolphin Birthday Song | Ocean Party Surprise
item.description: Underwater friends plan a Malayalam birthday bash for a dancing dolphin.

item.title: Koo Koo Theevandi | Train Ride Rhythm
item.description: A rhythmic train journey teaches patterns, safety, and Malayalam beats.

item.title: Veetumuttathe Praavukal | Village Courtyard Song
item.description: Friendly doves guide kids through games and chores in a Kerala courtyard.

item.title: Kochu Nakshathrame | Star Gazing Storytime
item.description: A bedtime story teaches constellations through Malayalam myths and songs.

item.title: Baby Baby Karayalle | Feelings Song for Toddlers
item.description: A comforting tune helps toddlers name emotions and calm their minds.

item.title: Kaattile Koottukar | Forest Friends Adventure
item.description: Children camp in a Kerala forest and learn empathy from animal friends.

item.title: Pachakkari Song | Vegetable Market Carnival
item.description: A catchy market rhyme teaches Malayalam names of vegetables and helpful habits.

item.title: Pacha Thatha Paattu | Grandpa’s Garden Adventure
item.description: Grandpa teaches herbal wisdom through a musical walk in the garden.

item.title: Onnanam Kochu Thumbi | Nature Dance Song
item.description: Butterfly friends teach graceful Malayalam dance steps in a garden fiesta.

item.title: Ambiliyammavaa | Full Moon Lullaby Malayalam Cartoon
item.description: A gentle lullaby about Ambili Amma and the moonlit courtyard of Kerala nights.
